title: Six people arrested for filling station melee
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Six people have been arrested for obstructing the duties of Police officers near a filling station in Baduraliya.
Sri Lanka Police said that the filling station had delivered fuel for Ambulances and doctors, citing essential services, on Thursday (16).
The arrested men had obstructed the duties of the police officers when an ambulance was being refueled.
The arrested suspects are to be produced at the Matugama Magistrate’s Court on Friday (17).
